mapper.select: SELECT with_pet_no , building , category3 , road , tel , homepage , day_off , hour , parking , with_pet_info , only_pet_info , pet_size , pet_limit , inside , outside , extra FROM with_pet WHERE with_pet_no=#{with_pet_no}

SELECT*FROM(SELECT ROWNUM as rn, with_pet_no , building , category3 , road , tel , homepage , day_off , hour , parking , with_pet_info , only_pet_info , pet_size , pet_limit , inside , outside , extra from with_pet WHERE ROWNUM <=(2*10) ) WHERE rn>((2-1)*10)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn ,with_pet_no , building , category3 , road , tel , homepage , day_off , hour , parking , with_pet_info , only_pet_info , pet_size , pet_limit , inside , outside , extra FROM with_pet WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) ) WHERE rn > ( ( #{cri.pageNum} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount} )
